column2: Donate to the Sixth House
Send some of your wealth to help the Sixth House.
Show Trial
Give up a prisoner, to be judged by a member of Sixth House.
Cleanse Provinces.
Ask [Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle] to help with widespread dangers in your provinces.
Sixth House Army
Call upon forces of Sixth House to defend your territory against outlander invaders.
Influencing Dreams
Ask [Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle] to use [Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetHerHis] influence over local populace to lower unrest.
Guiding Dreams
Ask [Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle] to help you overcome mental challenges.
[Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle]'s Blessing
Ask [Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle] to grant you additional protection agains your enemies.
Curing Dream
Ask [Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle] to help you overcome physical illness.
Divine Disease
Meditate and ask [Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle] for guidance in deepening connection with [Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetHerHim] and Heart of Lorkhan.
